verses.verse: To the <S%H5329>chief<s%> <S%H5329>Musician,<s%> A Psalm of <S%H1732>David<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%> The <S%H6588>transgression<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> my <S%H3820>heart,<s%> that there is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H6343>fear<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>
For he <S%H2505>flatters<s%> himself in his own <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> until his <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> be <S%H4672>found<s%> to be <S%H8130>hateful.<s%>
The <S%H1697>words<s%> of his <S%H6310>mouth<s%> are <S%H205>iniquity<s%> and <S%H4820>deceit:<s%> he has <S%H2308>left<s%> off to be <S%H7919>wise,<s%> and to do <S%H3190>good.<s%>
He <S%H2803>devises<s%> <S%H205>mischief<s%> on his <S%H4904>bed;<s%> he <S%H3320>sets<s%> himself in a <S%H1870>way<s%> that is not <S%H2896>good;<s%> he <S%H3988>abhors<s%> not <S%H7451>evil.<s%>
Your <S%H2617>mercy,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> is in the <S%H8064>heavens;<s%> and your <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> reaches to the <S%H7834>clouds.<s%>

Your <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> is like the <S%H410>great<s%> <S%H2042>mountains;<s%> your <S%H4941>judgments<s%> are a <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H8415>deep:<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> you <S%H3467>preserve<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>beast.<s%>

<S%H4100>How<s%> <S%H3368>excellent<s%> is your loving <S%H2617>kindness,<s%> O <S%H430>God!<s%> therefore the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%> put their <S%H2620>trust<s%> under the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> of your <S%H3671>wings.<s%>

They shall be <S%H7301>abundantly<s%> <S%H7301>satisfied<s%> with the <S%H1880>fatness<s%> of your <S%H1004>house;<s%> and you shall make them <S%H8248>drink<s%> of the <S%H5158>river<s%> of your <S%H5730>pleasures.<s%>
For with you is the <S%H4726>fountain<s%> of <S%H2416>life:<s%> in your <S%H216>light<s%> shall we <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H216>light.<s%>
O <S%H4900>continue<s%> your loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> to them that <S%H3045>know<s%> you; and your <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> to the <S%H3477>upright<s%> in <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
Let not the <S%H7272>foot<s%> of <S%H1346>pride<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> against me, and let not the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H5110>remove<s%> me.
<S%H8033>There<s%> are the <S%H6466>workers<s%> of <S%H205>iniquity<s%> <S%H5307>fallen:<s%> they are <S%H1760>cast<s%> <S%H1760>down,<s%> and shall not be <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H6965>rise.<s%>
